desc: You're Pawfect You're Pawfect is a unique pooch emporium where you can browse high-end dog fashion, get a Japanese-style fur-do, or relax in the friendly vegan café. Visit our flagship Brighton store for bi-monthly events and puppy parties and you'll soon be part of our Pawfect family. www.YourePawfect.com | You're Pawfect

layout.text: Ready, Set, Gooooo! Walkies the streets in style
